name: com.theone.foundation.buildscript
description: Unity build script that use to build for multiple platform.

_upm.changelog:
### [1.2.4] - 2025-01-15
- Added inline changelog in package.json for Unity Package Manager
- Recent version history now visible directly in Package Manager UI

### [1.2.3] - 2025-01-15
- Added Unity Package Manager documentation links (changelog, documentation, license)
- Fixed changelog visibility in Package Manager UI

### [1.2.2] - 2025-01-15
- Added FORCE_STRIP_CODE_HIGH symbol for forcing high managed stripping level
- Enables size optimization testing without full production settings

### [1.2.1] - 2025-01-14
- BREAKING: Refactored to pure schema-based conditional addressables
- Removed all prefix-based logic (Debug/Creative/Editor)
- Groups now use IncludeInBuildWithSymbolSchema or ExcludeInBuildWithSymbolSchema
